welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sudbury, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historical landmarks, and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your time here and take the opportunity to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and offers various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private jet operations and provides exclusive services for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by selecting 'Hanscom Field WiFi' and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Logan International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Logan International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A modern terminal at Logan International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights for JetBlue and other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The international terminal at Logan International Airport, serving flights to and from Europe, Asia, and the Middle East.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Worcester Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Worcester Regional Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The terminal for private and charter flights at Boire Field Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
